description: The round payoff this round was 80. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.
Mutual selection of option 1 maximizes both players' payoffs, as seen in the round where both received 40 each
The game incentivizes coordination, as choosing the same action (both 1 or both 2) yields higher payoffs than mismatched choices
Unilateral deviation to option 2 when the other chooses option 1 reduces the defector’s payoff (30 vs. 40), discouraging uncoordinated moves
